transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, haan ji, very good morning sir, Priyanka baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji, Gitika ji senior manager, baki mujhe ek cheez aapse ye confirm karni thi, kal aapka unka call pe discussion hua, aapne not satisfied mark kiya sir. Koi specific reason sir not satisfied mark karne ka because is vajah se concern raise hua tha.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ke, to please aap mujhe bataiye koi problem aapko aa rahi hai apne account manager ke end se?
Customer: Nahi manager mein problem nahi hai, aapka IndiaMART ke account mein problem hai.
Executive: Kya problem hai bataiye.
Customer: Dekhiye, main search karta hu 10 lakh ke upar order value ka West Bengal mein, ek bhi order nahi dikhata.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: 1 lakh ke upar ek do order dikhate hain.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Baki sab jhol order dikhate hain. Ye aisa matlab aisa dikhane ka aur buylead dikhane ka kya matter hai matlab kuch samjha nahi main.
Executive: Sir 9 tarikh ko jo bhi aapne leads consume kari hai wo matlab 2 lakh, 3 lakh, 4 lakh aise hi consume kari hai sir. 5 lakh 85000 ki bhi.
Customer: Aisa aisa main to 6 saal se use kar raha hu aisa to kabhi nahi hua lekin abhi aisa kyu ho raha hai?
Executive: Sir dekhiye jaise jaise requirements aayengi waise aapko leads milengi.
Customer: Pura Bengal mein 10 lakh ke upar requirement nahi hai, main aapko dikhau 10 lakh ke upar requirement kitna hai. Dekhiye abhi bhi 10 lakh ke upar koi bhi requirement nahi hai. Abhi instant main check kar raha hu apne mobile se. West Bengal recent aur above 10 lakh koi requirement nahi hai. Thik hai order value above 1 lakh. 1 lakh ke upar ek requirement hai. 1 lakh ke upar ek requirement hai. To madam ye bataiye hum kya buylead purchase karenge aapke yaha se?
Executive: But sir aap jo consume kar rahe ho waha par to aap bulk order ke hi leads utha rahe ho na sir aisa to hai nahi ki retail leads utha rahe ho sir.
Customer: Are madam koi bhi lead aa hi nahi raha hai last do teen mahine se.
Executive: Do teen mahine se?
Customer: Jab renewal karne ka time hota hai na, jab renewal karne ka time hota hai tab aapka lead bahut achcha chal hi raha tha. Jab renewal ka paisa chala jata hai to uske baad do teen mahine baad lead khatam. Lead thik thak se nahi aata hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Aisa bhi to nahi hai ki mera listing jo hai listing badal diya humne, listing jo renewal se pehle tha wo renewal ke baad wahi bhi listing hai.
Executive: Chala rahe ho sir MDC ka mini dynamic catalog aap.
Customer: Are haan.
Executive: Keh rahi hu sales service to chala hi rahe hain aap mini dynamic cat.
Customer: Haan wahi same service hai sabhi service hai lekin leads nahi hai. Aise karke kaise hoga aap buyleads denge hum buyleads deke purchase karenge thik baat hai. Lekin kya purchase karenge leads hai hi nahi purchase kya karenge?
Executive: Sir aap jo keh rahe ho leads nahi hai lekin jo maine aapka buying behavior pattern dekha hai us hisab se to leads aap consume kar rahe ho.
Customer: Aapka whatsapp number hai? Sir mera whatsapp number hai, sir whatsapp number hai. Bhejiye main aapko screen recording bhej raha hu main pura is cheez ka. Ek bhi ek bhi leads nahi hai.
Executive: Main aapko wo chart dikha sakti hu jaha pe aapne leads ka consumption kiya hai agar aapko aisa lag raha ho aapne Guwahati ki.
Customer: Lead ka consumption to main main ulta seedha dekhiye bahar ka lead hum log bahar ka lead bahut kam consume karte hain. Jab lead nahi hai buylead buylead ka kharcha karna hai tab hum bahar bahar ka lead ko consume kar rahe hain kya karenge aap dekhiye aap mera lead manager bhi dekhiye. Bahar ka lead hai. Yaha pe lead hi nahi hai to kya consume karenge?
Executive: Sir ek se do lakh ki lead to solar panel ki dikh rahi hai West Bengal ki agar aap.
Customer: Haan dikh rahi hai main to main aapko screen recording bheju aap bataiye main aapko screen recording bhej raha hu main.
Executive: Sir aap West Bengal ka filter lagaiye usme jane ke baad.
Customer: Haan West Bengal filter hi West Bengal filter hi. West Bengal click kariye aur bulk business ka filter lagaiye dekhiye aapko leads.
Executive: Haan order value order value above 10 lakh.
Customer: Thik hai. Above 10 lakh kyu laga rahe hain bulk aur business ka filter lagaiye na sir.
Customer: Bulk aur business ka filter lagao. Above 10 lakh mat lagao bulk aur business ka filter lagao dekho solar power system mein bhi lead dikh rahi hai. UTL power conditioning unit 60000 to 61000 yaha pe jo information dikha raha hai ye bhi galat hai.
Executive: Uske niche dekho solar power system ka Nadia West Bengal ka hai.
Customer: Uske niche hai Nadia West Bengal ka hai 3 kilowatt 19000 20000 3 kilowatt on grid inverter 3 19000 20000 ye bhi hai.
Executive: 19000 20000 nahi 225000 se 3 lakh wala lead dekho solar panels.
Customer: Nahi nahi madam aapka service jab paisa lena hota hai tab service thik rehta hai jab paisa chala jata hai to uske baad service ghatiya ho jata hai. Ye sahi nahi hai madam.
Executive: Right sir. Aisa to nahi hai ki aapko isse achcha to isse achcha to business humko Facebook Google deta hai main aapke sath aapse paisa kyu luta hu hamara khud ka website hai khud ka sab kuch hai fir bhi hum log aapko paisa dete hain. Isse achcha to hamare Google aur Facebook deta hai.
Executive: Aapko inquiries bhi to aa rahi hai last month bhi 90 inquiries aayi hai is month bhi 31 inquiries aayi hai aur samne se aapke pass calls bhi aa rahe hain.
Customer: Madam aap khud aap ek kam kijiye na aapka number bataiye main aapka number setting pe dal deta hu aap khud phone utha ke dekhiye kya inquiry aata hai.
Executive: Sir nahi sir main aapka login authority nahi le sakti sir kyuki uski hame authority nahi hoti wo hum nahi le sakte sir. But mera aapse ek request hai aap apni.
Customer: Humne humne 6 saal mein aapko humne 6 saal mein aapko zero star kabhi unsatified kabhi nahi diya abhi kyu de rahe hain? Iske piche kuch karan hai isliye de rahe hain. Aur kuch karan nahi hota to hum kyu dete aapko boliye. Humko aapka wo jo wo jo manager hai usse humko koi shikayat nahi hai wo to kam karti hai wo apna kam kar rahi hai. Lekin aapke IndiaMART se hamara shikayat hai.
Executive: Okay, aapko IndiaMART se problem hai aap keh rahe ho but sir aapko 47 users ne rate kiya hai Nilesh from West Bengal 12 October ko bhi to kya aapko business nahi hua kya sir inse jinhone rate kiya aapko?
Customer: I don't know.
Executive: Ye phone karta hai hum log to baat karte hain.
Customer: But sir agar koi client aapko delivery aur satisfied se mark kar raha hai to kahin na kahin aapka business to hua hoga na sir aur samne se aapke pass calls aur inquiries bhi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Madam samne wala aap humko agar samne wala bolenge ki sir mere ko rating achcha de dijiye aapke aapke baat achcha hua to aap usko rating achcha de denge baat achcha hua isliye. Iska matlab to yehi hota hai.
Executive: But sir aapne to apne account manager ko but sir aapke account manager ne bhi aapse rating manga hoga aapne to usko rating nahi diya aapne usko bad rating hi diya tabhi concern raise hua hai.
Customer: Aapka account manager kab ne kab mujhse manga humko to IndiaMART ne manga.
Executive: Na na waha par whatsapp par aaya tha na how was your interaction with Gitika to aapne usme not satisfied mark kiya whatsapp pe aaya tha how was your interaction with Gitika kyuki wo aapke account manager hai to unke liye feedback tha wo but aapne not satisfied mark kiya isliye concern raise hua tabhi main aapse asking kar rahi thi ki aapko problem account manager ke end se.
Customer: Nahi account manager se hamara koi problem nahi hai. Account manager achcha manager hai. Aapka IndiaMART se hamara problem hai.
Executive: Haan okay.
Customer: Paisa lene ka time hota hai tab ho jata hai jab paisa matlab lead achcha dene ka time hota hai.
Executive: Request hai mera aapse ek request hai aap itni badi company chala rahe ho service aapko proper milegi kyuki dekhiye aap hamare koi naye client nahi ho aap hamare sath bahut long term se connected hai right sir. Humne humne notice kiya isliye humne aapko bola ki ye problem hai.
Executive: Hmm. Main samajh gayi sir aap 2019 se hamare sath listed hai but meri aapse ek request thi agar aap 5 to 10 minutes hame Google meet par de dete hain hum services ko aur samajh lete kyuki 2019 se hum wahi same service use kar rahe hain lekin hamare hamare competitors increase karte ja rahe hain apni services ko bhi enhance karte ja rahe hain to thoda sa agar aap bhi increase karoge to fayda aapka hi hoga na sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi wo increase nahi hoga dusra bataiye. Achcha. Achcha service dena hai to dijiye madam nahi to agle saal band. Bas. Nahi dekhiye sir ye 30 40000 jo 30 40000 jo aapke pass jata hai 30 40000 hum log agar facebook mein dalenge to hamara itna achcha lead aayega wo bhi matlab filtered lead aayega ki hum log waha se 50 60 lakh ka business nikalenge.
Executive: Sir facebook pe sir konsi youth facebook use karti hai aap pehle ye bataiye konsi youth jo hai facebook konsi youth use karti hai kya businessman facebook chalaata hai.
Customer: Madam facebook businessman businessman ka facebook facebook ka jo lead hota hai google ka jo lead hota hai wo har jagah pe jata hai fir aisa nahi hai ki wo facebook mein hi jata hai.
Executive: Main aapki baat samajh gayi main us baat se argument aapse nahi karungi but mera aapse ek request hai aapko abhi tak services mili hai aage bhi aapko proper service milenge please aap current trending services ko achche se use kariye aur aapka focus area sirf aur sirf West Bengal hai kya?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Okay, to thik hai sir wo hum dekhte hain aapko leads provide karenge baki aapko agar koi aur concern aata hai to please aap hame bataiyega.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Sir aapka yahi minimum order quantity matlab 1 lakh 2 lakh se above ka hi order uthate ho na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: 1 lakh 2 lakh ka bhi order utha lete ho na sir aisa to nahi hai ki nahi uthate ho.
Customer: Haan agar agar achcha order hota hai to utha lete hain aisa koi baat nahi hai ki nahi uthayenge.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Thik hai wo aapko milega wo hum aapka correct karte hain baki meri aapse ek request hogi aap apni services ko proper use kariye aur aapke pass abhi ek mail se feedback jayega related to please to us pe positive response dena baki aap jyada preference aapki local hai aur main categories jo hai wo loom solar panel hai monocrystalline solar panel hai solar panel hai off grid solar panel hai solar roof top hai aur yahi aapki main categories hai na solar se related solar hydro system se related.
Customer: Haan haan haan haan.
Executive: Okay sure thank you so much thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving leads as per subscription.

- Leads quality has decreased.

- Feels service is good only during renewal.



Resolution:

- Executive explained lead generation process.

- Executive checked customer's buying behavior pattern.

- Executive asked to use West Bengal filter.

- Executive offered a Google Meet to understand services.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will provide leads to the customer.

- Customer will receive a feedback form via email.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, refund, west bengal
